header.description: The Micro Focus Unified Functional Testing (UFT) Plugin plugin is a quality automation based plugin. It is run during development and deployment to automate the execution of functional tests.

step-type.name: UFT Scenario from Filesystem
step-type.description: Execute a UFT Scenario from the file system

property-ui.label: Tests
property-ui.description: List of tests or folders that contain tests, to run. Each line should contain a single test, folder, or MTB file.

property-ui.label: UFT parallel running mode
property-ui.description: This mode is for UFT GUI test only. With it enabled, you can define multiple tests and the environments to run with.

property-ui.label: UFT parallel running environments
property-ui.description: UFT will run on these environments in parallel(at most 4 environments simultaneously) for each test, examples: browser=FireFox64,browser=Chrome

property-ui.label: UFT Timeout
property-ui.description: Timeout value in seconds. Defaults to no timeout.

property-ui.label: Per Scenario Timeout
property-ui.description: Timeout value in seconds.

property-ui.label: Parameters Filename
property-ui.description: The name of the Parameters file created for execution.

property-ui.label: Results Filename
property-ui.description: The name of the XML the results will be written to.

property-ui.label: Verbose
property-ui.description: Display verbose output while executing commands.

step-type.name: UFT Scenario from ALM
step-type.description: Execute a UFT Scenario from ALM

property-ui.label: Test Sets
property-ui.description: List of tests or folders that contain tests, to run. Each line should contain a single test, folder, or MTB file.

property-ui.label: ALM Server URL
property-ui.description: The URL for the ALM Server.

property-ui.label: ALM User Name
property-ui.description: The user name for the ALM Server.

property-ui.label: ALM Password
property-ui.description: The user password for the ALM Server.

property-ui.label: ALM Project
property-ui.description: The project for the ALM Server.

property-ui.label: ALM Domain
property-ui.description: The domain for the ALM Server.

property-ui.label: Testing Tool Host
property-ui.description: The ALM Server run host (required if Planned Host selected).

property-ui.label: ALM Timeout
property-ui.description: Timeout value in seconds. Defaults to 10 seconds.

property-ui.label: Results Filename
property-ui.description: The name of the XML the results will be written to.

property-ui.label: Verbose
property-ui.description: Display verbose output while executing commands.

step-type.name: Publish Test Results to Octane

property-ui.label: Test Files
property-ui.description: List of files that contain test results, to publish. Each line should contain a path to a file, Ant style regular expression patterns are allowed.

property-ui.label: Product Area(s)
property-ui.description: Comma separated list of product area ids to assign the test results to.

property-ui.label: Backlog Item(s)
property-ui.description: Comma separated list of backlog item ids to assign the test results to..

property-ui.label: Server URL
property-ui.description: The URL for the Octane Server.

property-ui.label: User Name
property-ui.description: The user name for the Octane Server.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: The user password for the Octane Server.

property-ui.label: Shared Space.
property-ui.description: The Octane shared space id.

property-ui.label: Workspace
property-ui.description: The Octane workspace id.

property-ui.label: Release
property-ui.description: The release id to assign test results to.

property-ui.label: Tags
property-ui.description: Assign tags to test result in format TYPE=VALUE.

property-ui.label: Skip Errors
property-ui.description: Skip errors on the server side.

property-ui.label: Check Result
property-ui.description: Check test result state after push.

property-ui.label: Verbose
property-ui.description: Display verbose output while executing commands.
